price: Thus they tasted the evil consequence of their deeds, and the outcome of their deeds was a total loss.
arabic: فَذَاقَتۡ وَبَالَ أَمۡرِهَا وَكَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ أَمۡرِهَا خُسۡرًا
